short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the regular new tab page to Fresh New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace your new tab page with a simple, no fluff, Fresh New Tab.

✦Two display modes
«Custom links»
—  lets you setup links to your liking. Add, remove and rearrange icons however you want
«Your Top Websites»
— makes your browser to organize which websites to show according to your usage

✦Features
• Displays up to 10 icons
• Editable links
• Customizable wallpaper


✦Changelog:
v1.15 — 18-11-2022
• Added keyboard hotkeys
v1.11 — 19-12-2021
• Small fix for dragging icons via touchpad
v1.10 — 17-12-2021
• Added "Custom links" display mode
v1.01 — 14-12-2021
• Added error handling for the edge cases
v1.00 — 12-12-2021
• Initial release
